author: stsp
msg: On the 1.7.x-r1399174 branch, merge r1399174 from trunk.
Resolve a trivial conflict:
* subversion/tests/cmdline/patch_tests.py
(patch_lacking_trailing_eol): Use os.path.join(wc_dir, 'foo') instead
of sbox.ospath('foo').

author: mxmanghi
msg: adding acknoledgments in <simplesect> element in intro.xml

author: stsp
msg: Create a backport branch for r1399174.

author: stsp
msg: Follow-up to r1398304:
* subversion/svn/conflict-callbacks.c
(handle_text_conflict): Fix reversed strcmp() return value interpretation.
Restores the ability to mark a conflict resolved from the interactive
conflict resolution prompt. Ooops!

author: stsp
msg: Fix a diff parser bug where hunks are ignored if a context line is followed
by a "\ No newline at end of file." message.
Reported by: Christian Zangl
* subversion/libsvn_diff/parse-diff.c
(parse_next_hunk): Don't exit parsing loop early upon seeing a
"\ No newline at end of file" message after a hunk context line.
We must treat this situation the same as when an original or modified
line precedes the "\ No newline at end of file" message.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/patch_tests.py
(patch_target_no_eol_at_eof): Extend this test to cover the case where a
"\ No newline at end of file" message appears after a context line.
This bug slipped through because we only tested the cases where an
original or modified line precedes "\ No newline at end of file".
